hero.title: An Unforgettable Culinary Journey
hero.subtitle: Experience our seasonal tasting menu featuring locally-sourced ingredients and innovative techniques. Each course is thoughtfully crafted to tell a story and delight your senses.
hero.imageAlt: Elegant fine dining plated dish with wine pairing

about.title: Chef's Table Experience
about.body: Chef Alexandre Dubois brings Michelin-starred expertise to create an intimate dining experience that celebrates seasonal ingredients and modern technique. Our 8-course tasting menu changes monthly, reflecting the best of what nature provides. Each dish is a work of art, designed to surprise and delight.
about.subtitle: What makes our experience exceptional

chef.name: Chef Alexandre Dubois
chef.title: Executive Chef & Culinary Director
chef.bio: Trained under three Michelin-starred chefs in Paris and Lyon, Chef Alexandre combines classical French technique with modern innovation. His philosophy centers on respecting ingredients while pushing culinary boundaries.
chef.imageAlt: Chef Alexandre Dubois plating a dish

testimonials.title: Acclaimed by Critics & Guests
testimonials.subtitle: What they're saying about Le Jardin

items.text: A transcendent dining experience. Every course was a revelation. Chef Alexandre's creativity knows no bounds. Easily the best meal I've had this year.
items.author: James Anderson

items.text: The chef's table experience was unforgettable. Watching the precision and artistry up close made every dish even more special. Worth every penny.
items.author: Victoria Sterling

items.text: Impeccable service, stunning presentation, and flavors that will stay with me forever. The wine pairing elevated an already perfect meal.
items.author: Robert & Catherine Moore

items.text: As someone who's dined at multiple Michelin restaurants worldwide, Le Jardin ranks among the very best. A true culinary masterpiece.
items.author: Dr. Marcus Chen

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend reserving 2-4 weeks in advance, especially for weekend evenings and special occasions. Walk-ins are rarely available.

items.question: What is the dress code?
items.answer: Business casual to formal attire. We kindly ask that guests refrain from wearing shorts, sandals, or athletic wear.

items.question: Can you accommodate dietary restrictions?
items.answer: Absolutely. Please inform us of any allergies or dietary preferences when booking. Chef Alexandre will create a personalized menu for you.

items.question: How long is the tasting menu experience?
items.answer: Plan for approximately 3.5 hours. This allows time to savor each course and enjoy the full experience at a relaxed pace.

items.question: Is there a cancellation policy?
items.answer: Yes, we require 48 hours notice for cancellations. Late cancellations or no-shows will be charged $75 per person.

items.question: Do you offer private dining?
items.answer: Yes, our private dining room accommodates up to 20 guests. Custom menus available. Please contact us at least 3 weeks in advance.

items.question: Are children welcome?
items.answer: We welcome guests of all ages who can appreciate a 3.5 hour fine dining experience. Please note our menu is designed for adult palates.

items.question: What is included in the wine pairing?
items.answer: Our sommelier selects 6-8 wines to complement each course, typically 2-3oz pours. We offer both classic and premium pairing options.

settings.productNote: Submit your reservation request and we'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm.
